caption.title: Alternate smoothing parameters, AZDHS data.
caption.p:
Supplement to
Fig 2 , with smoothing parameters chosen to fit splines that are less ( A-F), or more ( G-L) smooth than the splines shown in the main text. Differences between H1N1 and H3N2â€™s age-specific impacts remain evident, especially in the oldest cohorts, regardless of smoothness.
